sentences.en: " The " presenting Bank " which is the collecting Bank making presentation to the drawee. "
sentences.cn: 付款人,即根据托收指示向其提示单据的人.

sentences.en: B;Of course ,we must give these checks to drawee bank to collect the funds they owe us .
sentences.cn: 当然，我们必须把这些支票交给票据付款行，并且收回他们欠我们的资金。

sentences.en: B: Yes, they separate all the checks according to drawee bank.
sentences.cn: 职员: 是的, 他们按照票据付款行区分开所有的支票.

sentences.en: Drafts must be presented to the negotiating ( or drawee ) bank not later than Oct .10, 2004.
sentences.cn: 汇票不得迟于2004年10月10日议付.

sentences.en: Drawee The bank that is going to pay the amount of money specified on the check.
sentences.cn: 付款人将支付支票上确定的金额的银行.

sentences.en: In a teller's cheque one bank is the drawer and a second bank is the drawee.
sentences.cn: 在银行柜员支票中,一家银行是出票人,另一家银行是受票人.

sentences.en: In case of bill purchase / discount , exposure per drawee generally should not exceed 35 % of the sanctioned fbp limit.
sentences.cn: 如果是押汇贴现票据，每个受票人的敞口通常不应超过批准的出口押汇限额的35 % 。

sentences.en: In the case of a cashier's cheque, the bank is both the drawer and drawee.
sentences.cn: 在银行本票中, 银行既是出票人又是受票人.

sentences.en: IV bank which collecting bank making presentation to the drawee.
sentences.cn: 付款人即根据托收指示向其提示单据的人.

sentences.en: Presentation, presentment: The collecting bank or the holder of a draft shows and hands over it to the drawee for acceptance or payment.
sentences.cn: 提示代收行或持票人将汇票出示并提交给受票人，要求承兑或付款的行为叫做提示。

sentences.en: Sight: The drawee sees te draft when it is presented.
sentences.cn: 见票汇票被提示时受票人看到汇票叫见票.

sentences.en: The bill must be unconditional between the drawer and drawee.
sentences.cn: 在出票人和受票人之间汇票必须是无条件的.

sentences.en: Then they deliver the actual checks to each drawee bank.
sentences.cn: 然后,票据交换所把这些实际的支票交给每个标据付款行.

sentences.en: There are three parties to a money order : the remitter ( payer ), the payee and drawee.
sentences.cn: 汇款单涉及三方: 汇款人 ( 付款人 ) 、 收款人、受票人.

sentences.en: This person ( the buyer ) is known as the drawee.
sentences.cn: 被指定者 ( 买方 ) 称为受票人.

sentences.en: When a Bill of Exchange has been accepted by the drawee it becomes negotiable.
sentences.cn: 受票人承兑汇票后,这张汇票就可以在市面上流通.

sentences.en: Yes, they separate all the checks according to drawee bank.
sentences.cn: 是的, 他们按照票据付款行区分开所有的支票.

sentences.en: Yes, we do. But we have to send a personal check to drawee bank for collection.
sentences.cn: 不, 我不是说我们不受理个人支票, 只是我们必须先把个人支票送到付款行去托收.

words.tran_cn: （支票、汇票等的）[金融]付款人，[贸易]受票人

trans.tran_en: the person or organization on which a cheque or other order for payment is drawn
